content: Watch out for the next Lavabat, and when you've tackled it, **don't head up the long set of stairs**. Instead, go to the left first. Take out the Revenant Archer and the Revenant that will emerge from the floor as you get close. When it's clear, head for the end of the path and turn right.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Camp of Seasons' and the sub-subsection 'Tip!'.
The content is as follows:
Watch out for the next Lavabat, and when you've tackled it, **don't head up the long set of stairs**. Instead, go to the left first. Take out the Revenant Archer and the Revenant that will emerge from the floor as you get close. When it's clear, head for the end of the path and turn right.
